cleaned_text: The [Bio Cleanse Organic Detox Kit](/organic-detox-kit) is probably the best colon cleanse/detox diet program in the world. It is the result of 8 years of research in conjunction with [Detox.net.au](https://detox.net.au), one of the internet's longest running and most respected health review sites. The result is a detox program that is affordable, made from premium quality organic ingredients, easy to perform by almost anyone and at the same time extremely effective. Many people have reported that the Bio Cleanse Detox: The Bio Cleanse can be performed over 9 days, which includes 5 days on a [juice fast detox diet](https://www.thebiocleanse.com/research/detox-diet-juice-fast), with no solid foods, or 14+ days which includes a modified diet designed to allow your body to eliminate toxins and restore digestive function while still eating. While performing either program, the cleanser will experience minimal cleansing reactions and hunger, even if only consuming juice, and remove years of accumulated toxins and food debris. The end result will be a better functioning digestive system and radically improved health. We welcome [feedback](https://www.thebiocleanse.com/index.php?route=information/contact) and [questions](https://www.thebiocleanse.com/index.php?route=information/contact), so please [contact us](https://www.thebiocleanse.com/index.php?route=information/contact), or if you would like to get started right away, then please [visit our product page](/organic-detox-kit).
